page.title: 18Annual Events-Gotherington
page.content: Every year there is a horse show.Lots of people come from all around the area.The show is held in Gotherington Fields,two miles outside Gotherington. As well as the show there is a Sports Day held at the Village Hall and on the playing field during June.When you win races you receive a can of coke for 1st,for 2nd it is a packet of Smarties,for 3rd it is a packet of crisps and 4th is a little packet of sweets.There are lots of races like the slow bicycle race,three legged race and flat races.You can buy hot dogs,hamburgers,coke,orange squash and sweets.On November 5th every year we have a Bonfire Night on the playing field.At the Bonfire they sell tomato soup,hot dogs and beefburgers.The Cub Scouts,Girl Guides and the Brownies all have a competition to see who can make the best Guy Fawkes.
